once CXF 4.1 (compatible with Jakarta EE 10) will be out, these dependencies could be removed altogether.
OK, I won't notify you about any of these dependencies again, unless you re-open this PR. ðŸ˜¢

Thank you @CapozXVII 
I think you need to do a couple of things, besides any eventual review of this PR:

1. submit your [ICLA](https://www.apache.org/licenses/contributor-agreements.html#clas) if you haven't before
1. open an improvement on [JIRA](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/SYNCOPE) for this work and then adjust this PR's title to contain the generated id `SYNCOPE-XXXX`
Thank you very much @CapozXVII !
Superseded by changes introduce on #516 due to CAS 7.0.0-SNAPSHOT

A newer version of com.nimbusds:nimbus-jose-jwt exists, but since this PR has been edited by someone other than Dependabot I haven't updated it. You'll get a PR for the updated version as normal once this PR is merged.

Ok so it seems the [startup issue](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/38186) was fixed by https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/commit/9eda564d063e347e7f937e61cd8c84819c670604 after Spring Boot 3.2.0-RC2 so it should be enough to just wait for next release and upgrade.

ok, i have send a email to secretary@apache.org

II did not fill in the notify project in my previous email, so I have now sent a new one

@flyueliu there is [one unit test failure](https://github.com/apache/syncope/actions/runs/7150630020/job/19475613454?pr=571#step:8:5890), please fix:

```
Error:    LDAPMembershipPullActionsTest.after:209 Â» NullPointer Cannot invoke "java.util.Set.add(Object)" because "memb" is null
```

Thank you very much @flyueliu 
I've cherry-picked this PR to branch `3_0_X` as 97d2ecd7d18188a75da8ea019665818ba067c2ae

> Thank you very much @flyueliu I've cherry-picked this PR to branch `3_0_X` as [97d2ecd](https://github.com/apache/syncope/commit/97d2ecd7d18188a75da8ea019665818ba067c2ae)

I'm very glad to participate and thank you for your review. I benefited a lot from it. @ilgrosso
